com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.engines

Interface ConfigurableEngine

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PIPEngine
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConformancePIPEngine, CSVEngine, HyperCSVEngine, JDBCEngine, LDAPEngine, StdConfigurableEngine, XacmlCSVEngine

    public interface ConfigurableEngine
extends PIPEngine
    ConfigurableEngine extends the PIPEngine interface with methods for configuring the engine from a Properties object.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    car

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(java.lang.String id, java.util.Properties properties)
      Configures this ConfigurableEngine from the given Properties.

        attributesProvided, attributesRequired, getAttributes, getDescription, getName

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        void configure(java.lang.String id,
             java.util.Properties properties)
               throws PIPException
        Configures this ConfigurableEngine from the given Properties.
        Parameters:
        id - the String name for this ConfigurableEngine used also to locate properties
        properties - the Properties containing the configuration parameters for this ConfigurableEngine
        Throws:
        PIPException - if there is an error configuring the ConfigurableEngine
